Token.Abstract: The RKObjectMappingMatcher class provides an interface for encapsulating the selection of an object mapping based on runtime values. Matcher objects may be configured by key path and expected value or with a predicate object.
Creates and returns a key path matcher object with a given key path, expected value, and an object mapping that applies in the event of a positive match.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path to obtain the comparison value from the object being matched via valueForKeyPath:.

Parameter.Name: expectedValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value that is expected to be read from keyPath if there is a match.

Parameter.Name: objectMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping object that applies if the comparison value is equal to the expected value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given key path, expected value, and object mapping.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a predicate matcher object with a given predicate and an object mapping that applies in the predicate evaluates positively.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: The predicate with which to evaluate the matched object.

Parameter.Name: objectMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping object that applies if the predicate evaluates positively for the matched object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given key path, expected value, and object mapping.

Token.Abstract: The object mapping object that applies when the receiver matches a given object.
The object mapping object that applies when the receiver matches a given object.
Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the given object matches the expectations of the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the object matches the expectations of the receiver, else NO.
